DOC.brief_title: Dehydroepiandrosterone Versus Growth Hormone Women Undergoing ICSI With Expected Poor Ovarian Response
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct Cairo university hospital Dar Al-Teb Infertility Assisted conception center , Giza Egypt . All patient attend centre evaluate expect ovarian response . Patients fulfil Bologna criterion definition poor ovarian response invite participate study sign inform consent form . 300 woman expect poor ovarian response undergo IVF/ICSI randomly divide 2 equal group use computer generate random number . Group 1 receive DHEA 25 mg ( DHEA 25mg , Natrol , USA ) t.d.s daily 12 week start IVF/ICSI cycle placebo similar GH daily day 6 stimulation day hCG trigger . Group 2 receive oral placebo t.d.s . daily 12 week ICSI addition GH Growth hormone ( Somatotropin , Sedico , Egypt ) 4 IU day 6 hMG stimulation daily dose 2.5 mg SC day hCG trigger . Patients include study subject full history take clinical examination . On second day menstruation serum FSH , LH , Prolactin Oestradiol assess antral follicular count ( AFC ) assess use vaginal ultrasound scan . AFC define number follicle measure 3-10mm . On second day menstruation serum FSH , LH , Prolactin Oestradiol assess antral follicular count ( AFC ) assess use vaginal ultrasound scan . AFC define number follicle measure 3-10mm . The stimulation protocol start day 2 use 450-300 IU HMG ( Merional速 IBSA , Lugano , Switzerland ) gonadotrophin release hormone antagonist , cetrorelix ( Cetrotide速 Merck Serono , Darmstadt , Germany ) 0.025 mg daily . Gonadotropins administer 4 5 day , dose adjust accord ovarian response . The ovarian response monitor transvaginal ultrasound serum E2 level .
